thread.title: Connect with Smart People through Zillable the Worlds First Innovative Social and Collaboration Network
thread.title_full: Connect with Smart People through Zillable the Worlds First Innovative Social and Collaboration Network - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Connect with Smart People through Zillable the Worlds First Innovative Social and Collaboration Network
text:
Zillable.com provides individuals and teams with a truly intelligent collaboration network for innovation-on-demand.
Los Angeles, CA (PRWEB) October 20, 2015
Zillable announced today the launch of the world’s first innovative social and collaboration network – Zillable.com . Zillable provides a collaborative ecosystem where people can connect with like-minded individuals to collaborate and innovate.
“With the Zillable Map, we connect the dots – the imagination and creativity of people expressed through ideas and publications,” said founder and CEO, Andy Pham. “We’ve created a platform to accelerate and celebrate innovation, foster open collaboration and co-creation, and maybe even change the world.”
Connections on Zillable are not based on who you know, your social status, experience or professional connections, but on capabilities, talents, thoughts, and imagination. Zillable encourages diversity in the thought process, building upon experiences, creativity, entrepreneurial success and learned lessons of individuals around the world. This novel concept of going beyond superficial social networking is the heart of Zillable.
Zillable features a game-changing collaboration and communication system, designed exclusively for innovators, disruptors, creatives, and entrepreneurs. The Zillable platform effectively merges social media with collaboration workspaces, creating a robust networking engine that transcends what we know today as the social and sharing economy.
“People share homes, cars and boats,” Andy said. “Why not ideas in a collaborative environment? Someone around the world probably shares the same thoughts and imagination as you. And you can find them on Zillable.com.”
Unlike other collaborative economy startups, Zillable isn’t just for the individual. Zillable also extends the promise of the collaborative economy into the enterprise, allowing organizations and businesses to participate, collaborate, innovate, and achieve operational excellence. The secured Zillable platform provides businesses with global, private collaboration networks that increase workplace efficiency and streamline the way employees brainstorm, network, and work toward innovation.
Build a better tomorrow with Zillable.
About Zillable
Zillable is the world’s first social and collaboration network for innovation-on-demand, where individuals and teams can creatively and dynamically collaborate, ideate, and publish. As a communication and collaboration system, Zillable provides disruptors and creatives with an intelligent network that bridges minds to go beyond superficial connections. With Zillable, you can establish genuine connections with like-minded individuals who can help you succeed. For more information, please visit Zillable.com .
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/1020/prweb13031110.htm
